description: Alice Frost, a house keeper, works for Ramon who is unrelenting in his assertion of authority. She despises him but also fantasizes about him when he's not around. One day Ramon catches Alice masturbating in the kitchen. He takes pleasure in humiliating and fucking her aggressively knowing that she is such a submissive slut. He then takes her into the bedroom, ties her down in vulnerable sex positions and fucks her deep in the ass!
title: Submissive Housekeeping Slut
